ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They had found their fathers astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the ones who found their fathers steeped in error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They found their father going astray
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They had indeed found their forefathers astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, they found their fathers on the wrong path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they found their fathers going astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They indeed found their fathers astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They found their fathers had gone astray;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily they found their fathers gone astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They had found their fathers astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly they found their fathers on the wrong Path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, they found their fathers on the wrong path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They found their fathers in error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They had found their parents astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed they found their fathers astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:69] Lo! they found their fathers to be astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They indeed found their fathers) in the life of this world (astray) from the Truth and guidance,
